title: Custom script font?
content:
Anyone knows if the font in this picture is custom or not?

Many thanks in advance.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317180119im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Screen%20Shot%202013-08-30%20at%2017_6598.11.37.png)

Font: 

 Blizzard 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317180119/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: woodwood

comments.content:
You can find it as  
 **[Blizzard](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317180119/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=URW&ffam=BlizzardD%20-%20Regular&fid=fd421784e47a5abbed2f8c57b9424c24&fstyle=i&fsize=60&text=in%20the&wrap=2)** by URW++  
or  
 **[Brush738](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317180119/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Bitstream&ffam=Brush738%20BT%20-%20Regular&fid=066172b32be0d1f4de617f80abca2c90&fstyle=i&fsize=60&text=in%20the&wrap=2)** available from Bitstream & Tilde  
and there was also a font named **[Bison BQ](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317180119/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Berthold&ffam=Bison%20BQ%20-%20Regular&fid=9d73dcb2f6b3ac6b844f04add52fa952&fstyle=i&fsize=60&text=in%20the&wrap=2)** by Berthold but I think it's not available anymore.
